Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the interior is grooved and partially covered with cream-coloured granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394016) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394016)
